summary: This is a comprehensive background check report on Jeffrey Epstein, generated by 'Plus Associates' on December 6, 2018. It compiles extensive personal, financial, and professional data from various sources including credit bureaus, utility records, corporate filings, and public records, listing his addresses, business affiliations, associates, vehicles, and political donations. This document appears to be a comprehensive background check or intelligence report on Jeffrey Epstein, compiled from multiple sources. It details his political contributions, criminal history, sex offender registry information, and vehicle registrations. The report shows contributions to both Democratic and Republican candidates, and extensively documents his 2008 conviction for procuring a person under 18 for prostitution. This document is a comprehensive background and investigative report on Jeffrey Epstein, compiled from various sources. It details his arrest records, business affiliations, corporate filings, financial transactions, and legal proceedings, including specific charges related to solicitation of prostitution involving minors. This document is a compilation of corporate and financial records associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including details of multiple corporations, UCC filings, real property transfers, and vehicle registrations. It reveals Epstein's use of corporate entities for asset holding and management, and connections to associates and properties. This document is a vehicle registration and ownership report for Jeffrey Epstein, listing numerous luxury and utility vehicles registered to him in Florida between approximately 1999 and 2018. It provides detailed records including VINs, registration dates, and associated addresses, likely compiled for investigative or asset-tracking purposes.

connections.description: Birkhahn is listed as a related name for the business 'Buffalo Management Enterprises Co. Inc.', where Epstein is an officer.
Indyke is listed as the Secretary for 'Zorro Development', a company listed among Epstein's work affiliations.
Both are listed in leadership roles (Epstein as Chairman, Oringer as Chairman of the Board) at Shutterstock, Inc.
Mark Epstein appears in a phone listing for an address associated with Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a potential familial connection.
Epstein made a $1,000 political contribution to Mark's campaign for Attorney General in 2001.
Epstein made political contributions to the 'FRIENDS OF PATAKI' committee.
Epstein made a $50,000 contribution to the 'SPITZER PATERSON 2006' committee.
Epstein made a $50,000 contribution to the 'SPITZER PATERSON 2006' committee.
Both are associated with SHUTTERSTOCK, INC., with Epstein listed as a Director and Berns as Chief Financial Officer.
Indyke is listed as an officer for a foundation and as the attorney/contact for a corporation associated with Epstein.
A vehicle (2005 Mercedes Benz) was transferred from Epstein to Maxwell.
Birkhahn is listed as the address contact for a corporation (Buffalo Management Enterprises) associated with Epstein.
Glass sold a property in Palm Beach to Epstein in 1990.
Both individuals appear in the same vehicle registration report, with Matruder listed as the owner of a vehicle (2006 Infiniti) within a document primarily focused on Epstein's assets.

keyFacts: The report is a comprehensive background check on Jeffrey Epstein dated December 6, 2018, compiling data from numerous public and commercial sources.
It lists 32 possible addresses, 18 work affiliations, 25 vehicles, 133 relatives, and 27 associates linked to Epstein.
Epstein's business affiliations include companies like J Epstein & Co Inc, Financial Strategy Group, Ghislaine Corp, NES LLC, and he held titles such as President, Chairman, and Principal.
The report flags that Epstein has a criminal record, that his SSN matches multiple individuals, and that residential addresses are used as business addresses.
Epstein made political donations, including $2,000 to 'Friends of Pataki' and $1,000 to 'Friends of Hevesi' in 2000-2001.
Jeffrey Epstein made substantial political contributions to both Democratic and Republican parties/candidates between 2001 and 2008, including $50,000 to 'SPITZER PATERSON 2006'.
Epstein was convicted on 06/30/2008 for 'PROCURING PERSON UNDER AGE OF 18 FOR PROSTITUTION' (Florida Statute 796.03) and was required to register as a sex offender in New York and Florida.
The criminal offenses occurred on 07/23/2006 and involved multiple female victims aged 14, 16, and of unknown age.
The report lists an extensive inventory of vehicles and aircraft registered to Epstein from 1968 to 2018, with plates from New York, New Mexico, Florida, and the Virgin Islands.
Epstein used aliases including 'EDWARD EPSTEIN' and had a documented physical description: 6' tall, 180 lbs, blue eyes, and grey hair.
Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on June 30, 2008, on a felony charge of 'OFFER TO COMMIT PROSTITUTION' and 'PROCURE PERSON UNDER AGE OF 18 FOR PROST'.
Epstein had a prior arrest on July 23, 2006, by the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, released on a cash bond.
The report lists Epstein as a Director and significant shareholder of SHUTTERSTOCK, INC., with multiple Form 4 filings detailing stock transactions.
Epstein was associated with numerous business entities including J Epstein & Co Inc, Epstein Interests, New York Strategy Group LLC, and a health office in Polk County, FL.
The document records various legal and financial judgments against Epstein, including a mechanics lien from 1995 for over $33,000 and a civil foreclosure case from 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein was involved in a network of corporations, including for-profit and non-profit entities, some of which were used to hold real property.
Epstein's corporate structures involved associates like Darren K Indyke (an attorney) and Jonathan Birkhahn.
Real property records show Epstein purchased a Palm Beach property in 1990 for $2 million and later transferred properties to corporate entities (Laurel Inc, Cypress Inc) in 2011-2012.
A vehicle (2005 Mercedes Benz) was transferred from Jeffrey Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell in 2010.
Multiple UCC filings indicate financial transactions and secured interests involving entities like Financial Trust Company, Inc. and banks such as Citibank and Mellon United National Bank.

Jeffrey Epstein owned a large fleet of vehicles, including multiple Chevrolet Suburbans (2001, 2003, 2004, 2016, 2018), Cadillac Escalades (2005, 2012), Mercedes-Benz models (1999, 2002, 2005 SLR), a Bentley Arnage (2006), and other luxury/specialty vehicles.
Vehicle registrations span nearly two decades, from at least 1999 to 2018, indicating sustained wealth and asset accumulation.
The records show a consistent Florida registration address, corroborating his established residence in Palm Beach.
Another individual, Matruder, is listed as the owner of a 2006 Infiniti within the same report, suggesting a possible financial or associative link.
The document appears to be a comprehensive asset report generated on December 6, 2018, likely by a financial institution or investigative body.
